definition[0]: a sign at the side of a road showing directions and distances
example[0]: I’m sure that signpost is pointing the wrong way.
example[1]: Just follow the signposts to the city centre.
definition[1]: something that helps you understand how something is organized, where to go, or what will follow – used especially in news reports
example[2]: As yet, there are few signposts pointing to success.
definition[2]: to show something clearly so that everyone will notice and understand it – used especially in news reports
example[3]: They have signposted their conclusions in the report.
